relicDescription: NSLOCTEXT("[D20C99C24B2FABB4DC05E3BF1EE067C5]", "8AA53F934AD38E70C1B5029897DCBD7B", "The Horn of Firebrand is crafted from the massive, spiraled horn of the great dragon Ignusis Firebrand. The surface has a lustrous, fiery sheen that shifts colors in sunlight - gleaming hues of crimson, gold, and deep orange wash the relic\'s surface, mimicking dancing flame. The horn\'s wide base tapers smoothly to a fine point.")
name: Relic_Legendary_Firebrand_Horn
